  • Method Details

    • run

      static <T extends Comparable<? super T>> T run(int runs, Supplier<T> clustering)
      Runs a clustering algorithm multiple times and return the best one (e.g. smallest distortion).
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of clustering.
      Parameters:
      runs - the number of runs.
      clustering - the clustering algorithm.
      Returns:
      the model.
